description.en: The course provides general knowledge of the properties and applications of rare earth metals and their compounds)
description.et: Kursus annab üldised teadmised haruldaste muldmetallide ja nende ühendite omaduste  ja rakenduste kohta.

objectives.en: The course provides general knowledge of the properties and applications of rare earth metals and their compounds)
objectives.et: Kursus annab üldised teadmised haruldaste muldmetallide ja nende ühendite omaduste  ja rakenduste kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed the course:
-knows what are the rare earth elements and their properties
-knows the most important compounds of the rare earth metals and their properties
learning_outcomes.et: -tunneb haruldaste muldmetallide olulisemaid ühendeid ning nende omadusi

learning_outcomes.en: -has acquired basic knowledge about finding, obtaining, producing and using rare earth metals and their compounds
learning_outcomes.et: -on omandanud põhiteadmised haruldaste muldmetallide toormetest, tootmisest ja kasutamisest

learning_outcomes.en: -has acquired basic knowledge about the effect of rare earth metals and their compounds on the environment and living organisms.
learning_outcomes.et: -on teadlik haruldaste muldmetallide mõjust keskkonnale ja elusorganismidele

learning_outcomes.en: -knows the details of the production of REEs  and science studies of rare earth metals in Estonia
learning_outcomes.et: -teab REE-de tootmise ja teadusuuringute üksikasju Eestis
